items.sentence: When do you think Tom will want us to help him?
This is a secret, so please don't tell anybody.
You're on you own. No one is going to help you.
That's a topic that we've been trying to avoid.
Tom and Mary moved into a retirement community.
One of the reeds of my harmonica has gone flat.
You want to go to Australia with us, don't you?
Anyone who feels cold can have another blanket.
I'd rather work night shift than work with Tom.
I have a lot of things that I want to do today.
I have a lot of things that I need to do today.
I heard Tom and Mary were going to get married.
I think we should tell Tom he needs to do that.
I don't know if Tom will tell the truth or not.
Mrs. Roland, what do you think of this problem?
The world could use a lot more people like Tom.
You don't need to tell me if you don't want to.
Tom has been friends with Mary for a long time.
Tom froze like a deer caught in the headlights.
Tom fell through the ice into the frigid water.
